attributes.action: Lobby FIFA to allow the England team's kit to display a poppy to support Remembrance Sunday
attributes.additional_details: Current FIFA rules prevent the England football team's kit to be changed to incorporate a poppy in support of the Royal British Legion's annual poppy campaign in the run up to Remembrance Sunday. The UK government should give their backing to the FA to lobby FIFA to change their rules to allow the England team to wear a poppy with pride in any international football match which is played on or near 11th November.
